titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on acrylic staple fiber, dyed, not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning, with a cut fiber length of 89 to 140 mm and a target length of 115 mm.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/10/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on acrylic staple fiber, dyed, not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning, with a cut fiber length of 89 to 140 mm and a target length of 115 mm.
